price: (5) And no mention [i.e., revelation] comes to them anew from the Most Merciful except that they turn away from it.
arabic: وَمَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن ذِكۡرٖ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مُحۡدَثٍ إِلَّا كَانُواْ عَنۡهُ مُعۡرِضِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wamā yatīhim min dhik'rin mina al-raḥmāni muḥ'dathin illā kānū ʿanhu muʿ'riḍīna
